channel.title: Release Notes on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Latest release
item.description: This article contains a summary of recent changes, enhancements and bug fixes in Aspose.OCR for Java 24.1.0 (January 2024) release. GPU version: 24.1.0 What was changed Key Summary Category OCRJAVA‑347 OCRJAVA‑348 Added recognition of handwritten text. New feature OCRJAVA‑350 Improved text overlay positioning in searchable PDFs. Enhancement Public API changes and backwards compatibility This section lists all public API changes introduced in Aspose.
